entry.title: Controlling IoT devices using a Voice Assistant
entry.summary: Create seamless conversational interfaces with all of your internet-accessible devices-from your connected television or fridge to devices in a connected power plant. By combining Azure Speech Service, Language Understanding Service (LUIS) and Azure Bot Framework, developers can create natural, human-like conversational interfaces to control smart devices.

entry.title: CI/CD for Azure Web Apps
entry.summary: Azure Web Apps is a fast and simple way to create web apps using ASP.NET, Java, Node.js, or PHP. Deliver value faster to your customers with a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline that pushes each of your changes automatically to Web Apps.

entry.title: Campaign Optimization with Azure HDInsight Spark Clusters
entry.summary: This solution demonstrates how to build and deploy a machine learning model with Microsoft R Server on Azure HDInsight Spark clusters to recommend actions to maximize the purchase rate of leads targeted by a campaign. This solution enables efficient handling of big data on Spark with Microsoft R Server.

entry.title: CI/CD for Azure VMs
entry.summary: Azure is a world-class cloud for hosting virtual machines running Windows or Linux. Whether you use ASP.NET, Java, Node.js, or PHP to develop applications, you'll need a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline to push changes to these virtual machines automatically.

entry.title: Custom Mobile Workforce App
entry.summary: Learn how the custom mobile workforce management app architecture is built and implemented with a step-by-step diagram that illustrates the integration of Active Directory, SAP, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: HPC Risk Analysis Template – Solution Architecture
entry.summary: Build an HPC risk analysis solution architecture with a step-by-step flowchart from Microsoft Azure that combines CycleCloud, Avere vFXT and Tibco Gridserver.

entry.title: Java CI/CD using Jenkins and Azure Web Apps
entry.summary: Azure App Service is a fast and simple way to create web apps using Java, Node, PHP or ASP.NET, as well as support for custom language runtimes using Docker. A continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline that pushes each of your changes automatically to Azure app services allows you to deliver value faster to your customers.
